name: html-sass-babel-boilerplate
description: Simple boilerplate for building web app with babel-cli and node-sass.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npx rimraf dist/css/*.css && npx node-sass src/scss/main.scss dist/css/main.min.css --output-style=compressed && npx postcss dist/css/main.min.css --output dist/css/main.min.css --no-map
scripts.build:js: npx rimraf dist/js/*.js && npm run lint:js && npx babel src/js/main.js --out-file dist/js/main.min.js --no-comments --minified --presets=@babel/preset-env && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/js/main.min.js -- dist/js/main.min.js

author: Oliver Findl
